title: Gradski stadion Luke (Mrkonjić Grad)
text: Gradski Stadion Luke is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Mrkonji%C4%87%20Grad">Mrkonjić Grad</a>, <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="FK%20Sloboda%20Mrkonji%C4%87%20Grad">FK Sloboda Mrkonjić Grad</a> of the <a href="Second%20League%20of%20the%20Republika%20Srpska">Second League of the Republika Srpska</a>. The stadium holds 2,000 spectators.
